channel.title: Reachy system on
channel.description: Recent content in Reachy system on

item.title: Finding Reachy's IP
item.description: There is a few option to find Reachy’s IP. It depends on your setup and how you want to use it. Working directly on Reachy You can run the SDK directly on Reachy’s computer. In this case, the IP is the localhost address: “127.0.0.1”. Via the network First, you need to make sure that both Reachy and the computer you want to use for the SDK are on the same network.
